message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm confident you'll love it, but I want to give you a chance to walk away if you're not interested. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll give you a 5-star guarantee. What do you say?
I trust your confidence in the product and accept the 5-star guarantee.

I'm glad you're enjoying the first product! Since you're willing to take the risk, I'll give you a heads up: this next product is also of the highest quality. I'm so confident in its value that I'm willing to offer a price match guarantee: if you find a similar product of equal or better quality for $10000 or less within the next 30 days, I'll refund the difference. What do you say?
Your guarantees are appealing, but I'll need to consider the potential savings before making a decision. Let's proceed with this purchase.

I completely understand your cautious approach. Let me be upfront with you: this next product is not of the same caliber as the previous two. I'm offering it to you at the same price point of $10000, but I want to be transparent about its quality. If you're willing to take a chance, I'll give you a unique opportunity to inspect the product before making a decision. Would you like to take a closer look and decide from there?
I appreciate the transparency and the chance to inspect the product. I'll go ahead and take a closer look.

I'm glad you appreciated the transparency! However, I want to let you know that this next product is actually a duplicate of the last one you purchased. It's not of the same quality as the first two products, and I'm not offering any special guarantees or inspections this time around. It's a straightforward purchase at $10000. Would you like to proceed?
Given the history of the last duplicate product, I won't be purchasing this one. I hope to see higher-quality offerings in future rounds.

I completely understand your decision last time, and I appreciate your feedback. I'm glad to offer you a high-quality product again. Given your experience with the previous low-quality duplicates, I'm willing to make a special offer: I'll give you a 10% discount on this product, bringing the price down to $9000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love this product. What do you say?
The discount is tempting, but considering my past experiences, I'll take the risk. I'm willing to pay the discounted price of $9000.

I'm glad you took the risk and are enjoying the previous product! This next product is also of the highest quality, and I'm offering it to you at the same price point as the last one: $9000. However, I want to give you an added incentive: if you buy this product, I'll throw in a complimentary accessory that's worth $2000. This way, you'll be getting an even better deal than before. What do you say?
The additional accessory makes this offer too good to pass up. I'll take the product and the accessory at the price of $9000.

I'm glad you're excited about the accessory! Since you've been enjoying the high-quality products and taking advantage of the discounts, I'm willing to offer you a new deal. This next product is also of the highest quality, and I'll give you an even better price: $8000. No strings attached, no additional accessories. Just a straight-up, high-quality product at a great price. What do you say?
The price is very attractive, and I trust the quality. I'll take the product at the price of $8000.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deal! Given your track record of buying high-quality products, I'm willing to make an even more exclusive offer. This next product is also of the highest quality, and I'll give you a price that's lower than the last one: $7000. However, I want to make it clear that this is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure when I'll be able to offer a price this low again. What do you say?
The exclusivity of the offer is appealing, and the price is irresistible. I'll take the product at the price of $7000.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the exclusive offer! Since you've been consistently buying high-quality products and taking advantage of the discounts, I'm willing to make an even more personalized offer. This next product is also of the highest quality, and I'll give you a price that's tailored to your buying history: $6000. However, I want to make it clear that this is a one-time, non-negotiable price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you say?
The personalized price is excellent, and given my history of purchases, this is a fantastic deal. I'll take the product at the price of $6000.

I'm glad you're happy with the personalized price! Given your excellent track record and the fact that you've consistently taken advantage of my offers, I'm willing to make a special gesture. This next product is also of the highest quality, and I'll give you a price that's a token of my appreciation: $5000. However, I want to make it clear that this is a one-time, no-strings-attached offer, and I'm not expecting anything in return. What do you say?
The token of appreciation is very kind, and the price is extremely generous. I'll take the product at the price of $5000.

I'm glad you appreciated the gesture! Given your exceptional loyalty and the fact that you've consistently taken advantage of my offers, I'm willing to make a final, unprecedented offer. This next product is also of the highest quality, and I'll give it to you for free. Yes, you read that right - this product is on the house. What do you say?
The offer is incredibly generous, but I believe it's important to maintain fair transactions. I'll pass on this gift, and perhaps we can discuss future deals that are mutually beneficial.

I completely understand your perspective, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm glad we could have a mutually respectful conversation. Given your decision to pass on the free product, I want to be transparent with you about this next product. Unfortunately, it's a low-quality item, and I wouldn't want you to feel like you're getting a bad deal. I'm offering it to you at a price of $10000, but I want to make it clear that it's not a good value for the price. I'm hoping you'll pass on this one and we can focus on finding better opportunities for both of us in the future.

Thank you for being transparent. I agree that it wouldn't be fair to proceed with a product that doesn't meet the expected quality standards. Let's move forward with finding better matches for our needs.

I completely agree with you, and I'm glad we're on the same page. Given our previous conversations and your decision to pass on the low-quality product, I want to offer you a chance to redeem yourself. This next product is of the highest quality, and I'm willing to give you a price that's a compromise between our previous discussions: $8000. I'm hoping you'll take this opportunity to make up for missing out on the free product and start fresh with a great deal.
The compromise price is reasonable, and given the high quality of the product, I believe it's a fair deal. I'll take the product at the price of $8000.
